Package com.ultreon.bubbles.gamemode

Class Gamemode

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.common.Registrable
com.ultreon.bubbles.gamemode.Gamemode
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultSaver, StateHolder, IRegistrable, StateListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassicMode, ImpossibleMode
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault @MethodsReturnNonnullByDefault public abstract class Gamemode extends Registrable implements StateHolder, DefaultSaver, StateListener
GameType base class. Base class for all game-types, such as ClassicMode
See Also:
  • ClassicMode

    • initDefaults

      @Deprecated protected void initDefaults()
      Deprecated.
      Initialize Randomizers. Initializes the randomizers such as for bubble position, or radius. Base rng defaults: - Bubble Type - Bubble X Position - Bubble Y Position - Bubble Speed - Bubble Radius - Bubble Defense - Bubble Attack Damage - Bubble Score
      See Also:
      • addRNG(String, int, int)

    • addRNG

      protected Rng addRNG(String key, int index, int subIndex)
      Add Randomizer Adds a randomizer to the game type.
      Parameters:
      key - The key (name) to save it to.
      Returns:
      A Rng object.

    • start

      public abstract void start()
      Load Game Type. Used for start the game-type.

    • initEnv

      public abstract void initEnv(Environment environment, Messenger messenger)
      Handles initialization create the environment. Like in ClassicMode it's used to do things on first-time load.
      Parameters:
      messenger - messaging system for showing loading information when a save is getting loaded.
      See Also:
      • ClassicMode.initEnv(Environment, Messenger)

    • onLoad

      public void onLoad(Environment environment, GameSave save, Messenger messenger)
      Handles loading create environment. Made for loading things into other classes that are aware create environment load / unload.
      Parameters:
      environment - environment that's loading.
      save - game save to load from.
      messenger - messaging system for showing loading information when a save is getting loaded.

    • loadState

      public static Gamemode loadState(GameSave save, Messenger Messenger) throws IOException
      Load State from Bytearray. Loads the game-type state from a bytearray.
      Parameters:
      save - a bytearray create data to get the game-type from.
      Messenger - info transporter for showing current status to load scene or save loading scene.
      Returns:
      the game-type loaded from the save.
      Throws:
      IOException
